The most anticipated Rummikub event is now officially announced: The 10th world Rummikub Championship (WRC 10).
Update now and join the Rummikub online tournaments for a chance to be the ultimate online CHAMPION!

The World Rummikub Online Championship is over! Thank you all for participating and congratulations for the proud winner! We hope you have enjoyed it as much as we did. Stay tuned for the upcoming tournaments and features.
Remove ads + Play Again for Facebook users in Practice game mode bugs fixed.

This is biggest update ever !!!
New and up-to-date design, cool features and a few fixes and enhancements that we've added:
Chat
Marking the last move
Vibration option
Easy arrangement on the rack
Increased size to your friends list
A more stable network connection
and more
Update now and enjoy a new and amazing Rummikub experience!

You asked for it - you got it!
* Invite friends with a private code
You can now invite friends via Whatsapp, SMS or e-mail.
* Bug fixes and performance improvements.
For any requests, suggestions or compliments you can write us to:
support@rummikub-apps.com
We would love to hear from you

TOURNAMENTS are finally here!

2 new and exciting competition modes:
Best of 5 and Score Rush
Achieve the best score and win the grand prize
Every day and every week
For any question, suggestion or just to compliment, write us to support@rummikub-apps.com
We would love to hearing from you
Enjoy the game!
